quote: Show up. Do the work. Be straight with your clients. And success will be inevitable.
why_clipworthy: It's a concise summary of Jay's core philosophy.
suggested_hook: The secret to real estate success in one sentence.

quote: Anybody who sends me these postcards as consistently as you've done for the past 10 months, that's who I want to work with.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the power of consistency in marketing.
suggested_hook: Why consistency in marketing pays off big time.
